CHAT.comment: JOSEPH C. ROELL, PETRA GARIBAY, AND JAMES REAGAN, Petitioners v. JON MICHAEL WITHROW
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:08 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LISA R. ESKOW ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF AMANDA FROST ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LISA R. ESKOW ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
